column5: hey folks just thought i would share a few pics from the last 2 times i have had a chance to do a little fishing.  the best thing is i have had a chance to do it with my stepson ethan.  he is becoming quite the little angler at 5 years old.  the first pic is of a small mouth we got out of one of our farm ponds, there are only a couple of them in there, but seem to be doing pretty good, i guess it around 2.5 lbs   the next picture is of a blue cat.  this is the best one i have caught this year, but i hope to improve some as i get to do more fishing once school is out.  it weighed about 15 lbs.  ethan went wild when he saw it, he said "  Thats the biggest fish i NEVER SAW.  Ethan managed to catch several bluegills and a nice little largemouth that evening.  The next time i got out was to a little creek that feeds into the ohio river.  all together i landed 13 fish 8 flat head catfish , 2 drum a smallmouth, a sucker  , and a nice little sauger  ( closest thing to a walleye i can get without heading north).  no real size yet, but im hoping to do a little better down the road, sure was alot of fun catching them all though.  hope i havent bored ya'll to death.  good luck out on the water.  jason
nice report, thanks for sharing the pics.
Good report Jason!  Congrats on having fun with the little man!  Whopper

Nice report and pics!  You've got that "perspective" down pat with the smaller fish pics....haha.   Looked like you had a great time out there...it's always fun to get the kids out there as well.  Thanks for sharing!
Ox, thanks for sharing.  Its obvious by his expression that the little guy appriciates fishing, and spending time with you.  RB
